bio: Klaus Wagner is a painter from Vienna, specializing in Art Nouveau and decorative arts. His work features flowing lines, organic forms, and intricate patterns inspired by the Secession movement. He creates both large-scale paintings and decorative panels.

media.videoPost: Working on decorative panels in my Vienna studio, inspired by the Secession movement. Art Nouveau flows through my brush - organic forms, flowing lines, intricate patterns. Each piece tells a story of beauty and elegance. #ArtNouveau #DecorativeArts #ViennaArtist
